About Me

Let me tell you few things...

BIO

I am a junior full stack web developer with a passion for learning and exploring new technologies. I am a fast learner who is always passionate in learning new skills, and a strong team contributor with experience working efficiently in a team from past few college based projects, but am also at complete ease when working alone. I possess a computer science background with successfully completed my Research on Facial Expression Recognition, but have found my true calling in web development.
